## memos.Api.openNew() method

Opens pre-populated memo window.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
openNew(request: OpenNewRequest): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [OpenNewRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.memos.opennewrequest.md) | the open new memo request. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```
const request: OpenNewRequest = {
  matterId: 'fd540bd6-f74c-45bf-b2ab-8107d0781a83',
  title: 'Client Meeting Notes',
  text: 'The client accepted our proposal'
};

await sdk.memos.openNew(request);
```
